properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 6 at 9:42AM EST until February 6 at 11:30AM EST by NWS Raleigh NC
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a

* Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for...
Guilford County in central North Carolina...

* Until 1130 AM EST.

* At 936 AM EST, gauge reports indicated rises approaching flood
stage along Ryan Creek at US 220 in Greensboro and Brush Creek at
Muirfield Road in Guilford County. North Buffalo and South Buffalo
Creeks are also rising. Up to two inches of rain have already
fallen.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Greensboro, High Point, McLeansville, Summerfield, Gibsonville,
Stokesdale, Pleasant Garden, Jamestown, Lake Guilford Mackintosh
Marina and Forest Oaks.

This includes the following streams and drainages...Ryan Creek,
Brush Creek, Haw River, North Buffalo Creek, and South Buffalo Creek.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.
